AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Yusif Ahmed Rufied: defendant charged with unlawfully transporting illegal aliens, claimed to be a driver in training, received $1000 from Codefendant
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruce Henderson: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) Agent and witness, testified against Defendant, described terrain and events related to the smuggling case, stated Codefendant's statements about payments
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Martin Adaboh: Codefendant of Yusif Ahmed Rufied, from Ghana, Africa, lives in Quebec, Montreal, Canada, involved in smuggling aliens, changed mind about speaking with ICE agents, described the area surrounding Diesel 2000, made statements about payments
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Claudia: woman met by Codefendant at the Monterrey Inn, approached Codefendant to smuggle aliens, present during alien loading
